TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SignedCms extends System.Object

summary.span: The class enables signing and verifying of CMS/PKCS #7 messages.

span.span: The class enables signing and verifying of CMS/PKCS #7 messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密碼編譯訊息語法 RFC 與這些內容的型別，指定 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的檔案名稱副檔名與下列 MIME 類型。The Cryptographic Message Syntax RFC specifies the following MIME types and file name extensions for CMS/PKCS #7 messages with these content types. |內容類型Content type|MIME 類型MIME type|副檔名Extension| |------------------|---------------|---------------| |envelopedDataenvelopedData|應用程式/pkcs7 mimeapplication/pkcs7-mime|.p7m.p7m| |signedDatasignedData|應用程式/pkcs7 簽章application/pkcs7-signature|.p7s.p7c.p7s.p7c|

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: The constructor creates an instance of the class.

span.span: The constructor creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別具有下列的預設屬性值。The class has the following default property values. |屬性Property|預設值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||1.2.840.113549.1.7.1 （資料） 長度： 01.2.840.113549.1.7.1 (data)Length: zero| ||卸離狀態： `false` CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的簽章資訊中包含已簽署內容。Detached state: `false` The content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information.| 預設值簽署人是 SubjectIdentifierType.IssuerAndSerialNumber。The default for signers is SubjectIdentifierType.IssuerAndSerialNumber. 如果中斷連結的狀態是`false`（預設值），以及簽章資訊的 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息中包含帶正負號的內容。If the detached state is `false` (the default), the signed content is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information. 如果中斷連結的狀態是`true`，無法解碼 S/MIME 訊息的用戶端仍然可以看到訊息的內容，如果它會個別傳送。If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately. 這可能是實用的封存的應用程式，以封存訊息內容是否可以驗證訊息傳送者的真實性。This may be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether the message sender can be verified for authenticity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式搭配使用的預設屬性值，請參閱。For the default property values used with this constructor, see . 如果中斷連結的狀態是`false`（預設值），以及簽章資訊的 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息中包含已簽署的內容。If the detached state is `false` (the default), the content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information. 如果中斷連結的狀態是`true`，無法解碼 S/MIME 訊息的用戶端仍然可以看到訊息的內容，如果它會個別傳送。If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately. 這可能是實用的封存的應用程式，以封存訊息內容是否可以驗證訊息傳送者的真實性。This might be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether the message sender can be verified for authenticity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果中斷連結的狀態是`false`（預設值），以及簽章資訊的 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息中包含已簽署的內容。If the detached state is `false` (the default), the content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information. 如果中斷連結的狀態是`true`，無法解碼 S/MIME 訊息的用戶端仍然可以看到訊息的內容，如果它會個別傳送。If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately. 這可能是實用的封存的應用程式，以封存訊息內容可以驗證訊息傳送者的真實性。This may be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether or not the message sender can be verified for authenticity.

summary.span: The method verifies the data integrity of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

summary.span: is a specialized method used in specific security infrastructure applications that only wish to check the hash of the CMS message, rather than perform a full digital signature verification.

span.span: is a specialized method used in specific security infrastructure applications that only wish to check the hash of the CMS message, rather than perform a full digital signature verification.

summary.span: does not authenticate the author nor sender of the message because this method does not involve verifying a digital signature.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CheckSignature(bool verifySignatureOnly) cil managed

param.name: verifySignatureOnly
param.span: A value that specifies whether only the digital signatures are verified without the signers' certificates being validated.

span.span: A value that specifies whether only the digital signatures are verified without the signers' certificates being validated.

param.span: If verifySignatureOnly is , only the digital signatures are verified.

span.span: If verifySignatureOnly is , only the digital signatures are verified.

param.span: If it is , the digital signatures are verified, the signers' certificates are validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.

span.span: If it is , the digital signatures are verified, the signers' certificates are validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.

param.span: The purposes of a certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation.

span.span: The purposes of a certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation.

summary.span: The method verifies the digital signatures on the signed CMS/PKCS #7 message and, optionally, validates the signers' certificates.

span.span: The method verifies the digital signatures on the signed CMS/PKCS #7 message and, optionally, validates the signers' certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會驗證所有簽章，包括副署，將 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息上。This method verifies all signatures, including countersignatures, on the CMS/PKCS #7 message. 如果沒有帶正負號的屬性包含與訊息，也會驗證這些屬性。If there are signed attributes included with the message, these attributes are also verified. 如果選擇此選項來驗證憑證，驗證憑證鏈結的整個包含的部分。If the option is chosen to validate certificates, the entire included portion of the certificate chain is validated. 如果數位簽章驗證失敗或不符合任何驗證需求，則這個方法會擲回例外狀況。This method throws an exception if the verification of a digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的位置上驗證的簽章所需的步驟包括訊息。The following example shows the placement of among the steps necessary to verify the signatures on a message. 在此範例中，訊息內容不會中斷。In this example, the message content is not detached. 訊息內容包含在訊息。The message content is included in the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#1)] 下列範例顯示的位置上驗證的簽章所需的步驟包括訊息。The following example shows the placement of among the steps necessary to verify the signatures on a message. 在此範例中，訊息內容卸離，因此訊息內容必須驗證之外，獨立訊息。In this example, the message content is detached, so the message content must verified independently of the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#2)]

summary.span: The method verifies the digital signatures on the signed CMS/PKCS #7 message by using the specified collection of certificates and, optionally, validates the signers' certificates.

span.span: The method verifies the digital signatures on the signed CMS/PKCS #7 message by using the specified collection of certificates and, optionally, validates the signers' certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會驗證所有簽章，包括副署，將 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息上。This method verifies all signatures, including countersignatures, on the CMS/PKCS #7 message. 如果沒有帶正負號的屬性包含與訊息，也會驗證這些屬性。If there are signed attributes included with the message, these attributes are also verified. 如果選擇此選項來驗證憑證，驗證憑證鏈結的整個包含的部分。If the option is chosen to validate certificates, the entire included portion of the certificate chain is validated. 如果數位簽章驗證失敗或不符合任何驗證需求，則這個方法會擲回例外狀況。This method throws an exception if the verification of a digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的位置上驗證的簽章所需的步驟包括訊息。The following example shows the placement of among the steps necessary to verify the signatures on a message. 在此範例中，訊息內容不中斷，因此訊息內容包含在訊息。In this example, the message content is not detached, so the message content is included in the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#1)] 下列範例顯示的位置上驗證的簽章所需的步驟包括訊息。The following example shows the placement of among the steps necessary to verify the signatures on a message. 在此範例中，訊息內容卸離，因此必須獨立驗證訊息內容訊息。In this example, the message content is detached, so the message content must be verified independently of the message. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ComputeSignature() cil managed

summary.span: The method prompts the user to select a signing certificate, creates a signature, and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

span.span: The method prompts the user to select a signing certificate, creates a signature, and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會顯示您可以在其中選擇此訊息的簽署人的使用者介面。This method displays a user interface in which you choose signers for this message. 這需要確認目前的處理序正在執行*使用者互動模式*，亦即，屬性設定為`true`。This requires that the current process is running in *user interactive mode*, meaning that the property is set to `true`. 處理程序是通常於使用者互動模式中，除非它是服務處理程序或 Web 應用程式內執行。A process is normally in user interactive mode unless it is a service process or running inside a Web application. 簽署憑證的憑證符合下列條件將會顯示在清單中：Signers whose certificates meet the following conditions will be displayed in the list: - 憑證中有相關聯的私密金鑰。The certificate has an associated private key. - 憑證是在其有效期間內。The certificate is within its validity period. - 憑證中有沒有金鑰使用方式或支援數位簽章或不可否認性的金鑰使用方式。The certificate has no key usage or a key usage that supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation. 簽署者憑證從選擇 My 存放區。Signer certificates are chosen from the My store. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 下列權限，才能顯示使用者介面：The following permissions are required to display the user interface: - 下列權限，才能存取簽章金鑰：The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - - ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在計算的簽章使用不中斷的訊息內容的訊息。The following example shows the steps to compute a signature on a message with message content that is not detached. 在此情況下，將訊息內容包含在訊息。In this case, the message content is included in the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#3)] 下列範例示範如何在計算的簽章使用卸離的訊息內容的訊息。The following example shows the steps to compute a signature on a message with message content that is detached. 在此情況下，必須驗證訊息內容之外，獨立訊息。In this case, the message content must be verified independently of the message. [!code-csharp[mpkcs_SignedCMS#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/cs/Program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[mpkcs_SignedCMS#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/mpkcs_SignedCMS/vb/Program.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法使用取自成功解碼的資訊，重設之物件的所有成員變數。This method resets all member variables of the object by using the information obtained from successful decoding. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的位置上驗證簽章的過程中的方法訊息。The following example shows the placement of the method in the process of verifying the signatures on a message. 在此範例中，訊息內容不中斷，因此訊息內容包含在訊息。In this example, the message content is not detached, so the message content is included in the message. remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本會決定訊息是否為 PKCS #7 訊息或密碼編譯訊息語法 (CMS) 訊息。The version determines whether the message is a PKCS #7 message or a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) message. CMS 是 PKCS #7 的較新的超集。CMS is a newer superset of PKCS #7.
